janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata oksfard sarasawiye deshanaya pawathwimata awashya ida – kada salasa dimata apohosath wimen maha brithanya rajaya thaman asamath rajyayak bawata oppu kara athayi jathika nidahas peramuna penwa deyi.wenath rataka nayakayeku thama ratata pamini witaka ohuge katayuthu awashya paridi itukaraganimata ida salasima sama rajayakama yuthukama ha wagakima bawada eeye (02) madhya hamuwakata ekwemin ehi nayaka wimal wirawansha mahatha pawasiya.shri lankawa asarthaka rajyayak bawata pasugiyada chodana kalath maha brithanya athulu batahira ratawalin meratata pamini sama rajya thanthrikayakutama thamange awashyatha itukara ganimata ida salasa dimen shri lankawa asarthaka rajyayak nowana bawa oppukara athayi da ee mahatha kiweya.el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanayata udaw kala maha brithanya athulu batahira ratawal ee magin shri lankawa dekada kirimata sakas kala siyalu upayan parajaya wuwata pasuwa apa rate rajya nayakayata mese kenehelikam karanne raten paliganimata bawada wirawansha mahatha mehidi sandahan keleya.oksfard wishwawidyalaye deshanayak pawathwimata ehi giya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata ema deshanaya pawathwimata sudusu wathawaranaya brithanya rajaya wisin hithamathama ahimi kara athayi da me madhya hamuwe di penwadun jathika nidahas peramune nayaka wimal wirawansha mahatha mese da pawasiya.me rate koti thrasthawadin parajaya kirime yuddhaya uthsannawa thibu awadhiye pawa meratata pamini widesha rajya thanthrikayanta owunge katayuthu niyamakarayen itukara gena aapasu yamata ida – kada saha awasthawa salasa dunna.ee kalaye meratata pamini samaharun kotinta udaw kirimata ee pradeshawalata giya bawath apa dannawa.eheth wagakiwayuthu rajyayak lesa meratata paminena rajya thanthrikayanta owunge oona epakam itukara ganimata ida kada labuna.koti sanwidhanaya, prajathanthrawadi jathika sandhanaya, eksath jathika pakshaya ekwa kotinge lanchanaya, kotinge dhajaya pradarshanaya karamin wirodhathawala yedenta brithanya rajaya ida dila thibuna.
